TopicTitle: Game is freezing after pushing "launch" button

Articles.Content:

AMD Phenom II X6 1075T

GeForce GTX 750 Ti

8 GB ram

win 7 

 After pushing "launch" button, camera starts fly away from lounch pad into space.
